The game as a whole seems can be a lot of fun for any player. There is no single player story mode like most games; instead, there is offline "practice" against bots. The majority of the game comes from matchmaking - whether random or with friends. There are occasionally cheaters in matchmaking that can ruin the fun of a game. If you're looking for a serious game, this game is perfect for you. If you get into in, it can be extremely fun and competitive. If you're looking to just mess around and have fun by yourself or with friends, you'll probably still be able to enjoy Counter-Strike: Global Offensive in the casual game setting or group matchmaking.
